summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5669 for the improvement of The Alleys in Block 1, 10 and 11, H. E. Nelson Addition, being the alleys between 20th Avenue Northwest and 21st Avenue Northwest, from West 77th Street to West 85th Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75040, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
